GS24paninipu:81: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ || PS_1,2.37 ||
GS24paninipu:107: tiṣya-punarvasvor nakṣatra-dvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanaṃ nityam || PS_1,2.63 ||
GS24paninipu:109: vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ || PS_1,2.65 ||
GS24paninipu:172: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe || PS_1,3.55 ||
GS24paninipu:184: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne || PS_1,3.67 ||
GS24paninipu:242: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam || PS_1,4.32 ||
GS24paninipu:315: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ || PS_1,4.105 ||
GS24paninipu:316: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca || PS_1,4.106 ||
GS24paninipu:439: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī || PS_2,3.9 ||
GS24paninipu:536: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau || PS_2,4.33 ||
GS24paninipu:539: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti || PS_2,4.36 ||
GS24paninipu:586: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ || PS_2,4.83 ||
GS24paninipu:595: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartṛkād icchāyāṃ vā || PS_3,1.7 ||
GS24paninipu:600: bhṛśādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ || PS_3,1.12 ||
GS24paninipu:610: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ || PS_3,1.22 ||
GS24paninipu:678: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca || PS_3,1.90 ||
GS24paninipu:794: āḍhya-subhaga-sthūla-palita-nagna-andha-priyeṣu cvy-artheṣv acvau kṛñaḥ karaṇe khyun || PS_3,2.56 ||
GS24paninipu:1042: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham || PS_3,3.116 ||
GS24paninipu:1104: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ || PS_3,4.2 ||
GS24paninipu:1134: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām || PS_3,4.32 ||
GS24paninipu:1171: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ || PS_3,4.69 ||
GS24paninipu:1186: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ || PS_3,4.84 ||
GS24paninipu:1205: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca || PS_3,4.103 ||
GS24paninipu:1297: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre || PS_4,1.78 ||
GS24paninipu:1380: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca || PS_4,1.161 ||
GS24paninipu:1384: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati || PS_4,1.165 ||
GS24paninipu:1454: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ || PS_4,2.57 ||
GS24paninipu:1464: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni || PS_4,2.67 ||
GS24paninipu:1564: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca || PS_4,3.22 ||
GS24paninipu:1608: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ || PS_4,3.66 ||
GS24paninipu:1642: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane || PS_4,3.100 ||
GS24paninipu:1685: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ || PS_4,3.143 ||
GS24paninipu:1712: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam || PS_4,4.2 ||
GS24paninipu:1835: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ || PS_4,4.125 ||
GS24paninipu:1870: tad asya tad asmin syād iti || PS_5,1.16 ||
GS24paninipu:1904: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.50 ||
GS24paninipu:1934: tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī || PS_5,1.80 ||
GS24paninipu:1950: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat || PS_5,1.96 ||
GS24paninipu:1969: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ || PS_5,1.115 ||
GS24paninipu:2023: inac piṭac cika ci ca || PS_5,2.33 ||
GS24paninipu:2026: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac || PS_5,2.36 ||
GS24paninipu:2035: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ || PS_5,2.45 ||
GS24paninipu:2067: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā || PS_5,2.77 ||
GS24paninipu:2072: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām || PS_5,2.82 ||
GS24paninipu:2084: tad asya asty asminn iti matup || PS_5,2.94 ||
GS24paninipu:2198: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu || PS_5,3.68 ||
GS24paninipu:2222: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac || PS_5,3.92 ||
GS24paninipu:2250: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca || PS_5,4.1 ||
GS24paninipu:2367: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt || PS_5,4.118 ||
GS24paninipu:2448: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti || PS_6,1.39 ||
GS24paninipu:2508: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā || PS_6,1.99 ||
GS24paninipu:2683: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat || PS_6,2.51 ||
GS24paninipu:2722: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac || PS_6,2.90 ||
GS24paninipu:2865: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu || PS_6,3.34 ||
GS24paninipu:2923: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye || PS_6,3.92 ||
GS24paninipu:2941: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau || PS_6,3.110 ||
GS24paninipu:3015: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām || PS_6,4.45 ||
GS24paninipu:3032: sya-sic-sīyuṭ-tāsiṣu bhāva-karmaṇor upadeśe 'j-jhana-graha-dṛśāṃ vā ciṇvad-iṭ ca || PS_6,4.62 ||
GS24paninipu:3077: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ || PS_6,4.107 ||
GS24paninipu:3126: sthūla-dūra-yuva-hrasva-kṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ pūrvasya ca guṇaḥ || PS_6,4.156 ||
GS24paninipu:3128: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ || PS_6,4.158 ||
GS24paninipu:3309: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam || PS_7,2.61 ||
GS24paninipu:3369: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic || PS_7,3.3 ||
GS24paninipu:3392: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā || PS_7,3.26 ||
GS24paninipu:3410: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ || PS_7,3.44 ||
GS24paninipu:3439: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye || PS_7,3.73 ||
GS24paninipu:3453: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke || PS_7,3.87 ||
GS24paninipu:3634: gatyartha-loṭā lṛṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat || PS_8,1.51 ||
GS24paninipu:3694: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ || PS_8,2.37 ||
GS24paninipu:3699: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ || PS_8,2.42 ||
GS24paninipu:3737: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ || PS_8,2.80 ||
GS24paninipu:3743: guror anṛto 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām || PS_8,2.86 ||
GS24paninipu:3764: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau || PS_8,2.107 ||
GS24paninipu:3797: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam || PS_8,3.32 ||
